roleset.name: to undergo or cause to undergo mutation

role.descr: end state, arg 1 mutated into what?
start state, arg 1 mutated from what?

example.name: passive
example.text: Researchers in Edinburgh , Scotland , have found that in 23 of 38 breast tumors , [one copy of chromosome 17]-1 was mutated [*-1] at the spot where gene p53 lies [*T*-2] .
example.arg: at the spot where gene p53 lies [*T*-2]

example.name: With an interesting Arg 2
example.text: But it is mutating into something else; an international sex theme park.
example.arg: into something else; an international sex theme park

predicate.note: Frames file for 'mutate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
